text: Bring {{water}} to a boil in a large pot.
Rinse {{brown_rice}} in a fine mesh strainer under running water to remove excess starch.
Add the rice to the boiling water. Boil
column5: reducing heat as needed to maintain a steady boil.

text: Drain the rice and return it to the pot. Cover and let rest off the heat for 10 minutes.
Fluff and season with {{salt}} or other seasonings to taste.
